message.content:
{"id": "2694", "title": "Bug 2694: Editor Selection Dialog UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)", "description": "Bug 2694: Editor Selection Dialog UI suggestions (1GI6RPE) press Add for the associated editors.

a. Multiple selection could be enabled.

c. The default entry in the associated editors list could be marked as default (similar to perspectives).

NOTES:
KLM (10/10/2001 1:54:57 PM)
Also:

f. The dialog needs a width hint.






g. Why does the File editors Pref page grow in height when it is selected, but no other pages do the same?

I currently have fixes for a, c, f. Need to release.

KLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM)
Released fixes for a, c, f, g.", "OB": "No selection, but OK is enabled.

b. 'Add' should not add a hidden entry.", "EB": "Entries already existing in the associated editors should not be available for selection.

e. ", "SR": "Enable multiple selection for associated editors.

Mark the default entry in the associated editors list as default.

Provide a width hint for the dialog.

Investigate why the File editors Pref page grows in height when it is selected."}
